fields.text: The Obvious Stuff
- New Skills and Skill Visuals (See Animated Previews)
- Dozens of new uniques, sets and other items (See Items Tab of Menu)
- New Monsters and Levels (See Monsters/Levels Tab of Menu)
- Re-designed UI Theme
- In-game menu's for mod info, runewords, recipes and more
- Custom Launcher and Vault for extended options
Storage Changes
- All storage locations have been expanded to:

fields.tooltipString: These are the current size options available for storage

fields.text: - Shared Stash Tabs have been increased to 7 tabs
- Compatible with Vault program (Infinite Storage)
General Changes
- Storage Bag sytem for holding gems, runes, keys and organs
- Kill/Death Tracker (also used for exclusive items/recipes)
- Color Dyes (change color of any item)
- New characters start with replenishing tomes/keys
- New characters start with a skill, shield and the cube
- New sorceresses start with an orb instead of a staff
- New characters start with 10 additional base stats
- Gambling item pool greatly increased
Mercenary Changes
- All Mercs have 6 skills
- Each Act receives a unique aura
- Access to all equipment slots
- Advanced stats shown in main panel
- Will use basic attack much less often
- Always within 1 level of your character when hiring
- Experience gain increased by 25%-30%
- Mercenaries no longer have subtypes (excluding act5 merc)
- Max resurrect cost is now 5000
Level Changes
- Many multi-level dungeons have been reduced in level count, but increased in size
- 100 levels added after Baal (Torment Trials)
- Cow Level monster density increased
- Blood Moor monster density and champion packs increased
- Underground areas have increased size and more champion packs
- Waypoint added for the Secret Cow Level
- Waypoint added for the Chaos Sanctuary
Monster Changes
- Corpse Explode damage reduced to:

fields.tooltipString: Corpse Explode damage from enemies reduced

fields.text: - Act Bosses have a higher chance of dropping set items
- Act Bosses will always drop an essence for your first kill
- Countess always drops at least 2 runes
- Countess Nightmare and Hell drop rate increased
- Reduced Serpent Charge damage by 25%
- Reduced Viper Bone Spear damage by 50%
- Reduced Willowisp damage by 50%
- Reduced Burning Dead Archer damage by 50%
- Reduced other ranged skeleton damage by 25%
Stat Changes
- New Stats that increase per base stat invested:

fields.tooltipString: Corpse Explode damage from enemies reduced

fields.text: - Increase Strength/Dexterity/Vitality/Energy by xx%
- Area Damage Effect (Splash)
- Attacker takes Fire/Cold/Lightning damage
- Mana/Life gained when hit by enemy
- Mana/Life gained when strike an enemy
- Extra missiles granted for multi-missile skills
- Extra attacks granted for multi-swing skills
- Increase Summon's Attack%
- Increase Summon's Health%
- Increase Summon's Speed%
- Increase Summon Max Count
- Reduce cooldown duration of skills
- Increase curse duration
- Inrease curse radius
- +Magic%/+Poison% Skill Damage
- Enemy Fire/Cold/Lightning/Poison/Physical/Magic immunity reduced by xx%
Difficulty Changes
- Prime Evil Damage to Mercs changed:
- Prime Evil Damage to Pets reduced:
- Merc Damage vs Prime Evil increased:

fields.tooltipString: Mercs will do more damage to bosses

fields.text: - XP Loss reduced from 5% to 3% and 10% to 5% on nightmare and hell respectively
UI Changes
- Darker and more compact theming for all panels
- Character stats page re-designed for improved readability
- Advanced Stats integrated into main stats panel
- Experience Bar now has % indicators
- Integrated mod menu to show overall mod changes
- Animated Skill Previews for all class skills
- Full in-game cube recipe menu
- Advanced in-game runeword menu with mouseover stats
- Terror Zone waypoint visuals re-designed
Quality of Life
- Players start with cube
- Runes can now be removed from items without being destroyed
- Arrows/bolt/thrown weapons (not potions) have increased stacks
- Reduced Cost of all items by 20%
- Reduced Gambling Cost by 80%
- Item level (ilvl) display is now on any item that it matters
Launcher Options
- One-click mod updates
- Force map regeneration or enable character respec
- Change in-game audio or text language
- Force specific map layouts (Seeding)
- Customize monster density, champ packs, exp rate and nodrop settings
- Change in-game font
- Enable varying levels of item icons (pseudo loot filter)
- Enable varying levels of merc icons (glowing overhead identifier)
- Enable varying levels of monster stats display (hp and resistances)
- Change in-game runeword menu sorting method (name, itemtype, reqlvl)
- Automatically backup characters and shared stash periodically
- Choose between ReMoDDeD or standard UI theme
- Choose between merged or standard HUD display
